pkgmetadata.longdescription: Space-Filling Designs // Construct various types of space-filling designs, including Latin hypercube designs, clustering-based designs, maximin designs, maximum projection designs, and uniform designs (Joseph 2016 doi:10.1080/08982112.2015.1100447). It also offers the option to optimize designs based on user-defined criteria. This work is supported by U.S. National Science Foundation grant DMS-2310637.
